title: Guardian (Bu Hui Xia Qi) - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Familial Love   Family Conflict   Late Romance   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Older Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Reincarnation   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Shota   Showbiz   Siblings   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Slow Romance   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters   Younger Brothers
author: Can’t Play Chess   不会下棋
description:
Identity background: Fifteen years old, biological mother died, father unknown, holding a large legacy, poor performance in entrance examination, please choose a guardian.

Candidate one: birth mother’s brother, not close, but eloquent, very gentle, reliable and sincere.

Candidate two: The eldest son of the father who has never been seen. His occupation is unknown. His age is unknown. Nothing is known.

In the last life, Yu Shulin chose his uncle, his mother’s funeral was all done by him, and he promised to take good care of him.

The selection is completed, and the result is being read …

After the choice was made, open the [pit you pit you pit you till you die] ending, please accept.

Yu Shulin, who was counted by his uncle’s family for his inheritance, was eventually released from prison, but immediately got killed …

@ # ￥% & * …… Restore the file.

Identity background: Fifteen years old, biological mother died, father unknown, holding a large legacy, poor performance in entrance examination, please choose a guardian

Candidate one: birth mother’s brother, not close, but eloquent, very gentle, reliable and sincere.

Candidate two: The eldest son of the father who has never been seen. His occupation is unknown. His age is unknown. Nothing is known.

After the rebirth, Yu Shulin, whose negative energy exploded, said to hell and chose option 2!

The selection is completed, and the result is being read …

After reading the results, open the ending of [Just want to love you with the overbearing film emperor], please accept.

Yu Shulin, who was captive and was boiled like a frog in warm water: (╯ ‵ □ ′) ╯︵┻─┻WTF!>
